sentence.Network_en: The chances that the company will have any problems are infinitesimal.
sentence.Network_cn: 那家公司会遇到什么问题的可能性是微乎其微的.
其中有一个极短暂的停顿。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 无字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 无穷无尽〖 timeless〗 无穷小〖 infinitesimal;infinitelysmallquantity〗 无趣〖 feelsnubbed〗.
医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... infinite 无限的，无穷的 infinitesimal 无限小的，无穷小的 infinity 无穷大，无限，无限距.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... infinitely many 无穷多 infinitesimal 无限小；无穷小 infinity 无限(大)；无穷(大).
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... infinite a 无限的 infinitesimal a 无限小的 confine v 限制，监禁.

list.abs: infinitesimal rotation 无穷小转动infinitesimal transformation 无穷小变换inflationary universe 暴涨宇宙
PERCENTILE函数 - Sean的日志 - 网易博客 ... Irrational number 无理数 Infinitesimal calculus 微积分 Infinity 无穷大.
石油词汇英语翻... ... infinitesimal analysis 微积分 infinitesimal calculus 微积分学 infinitesimal deformation 无穷小形变.
infinitesimal rigidity 无穷小刚性infinitesimal rotation 无穷小旋转infinitesimal transformation 无穷小变换
infinitesimal geometry 微分几何infinitesimal method 无穷小法infinitesimal strain theory 无穷小应变理论

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin infinitesimus, from Latin infinitus (see infinite), on the pattern of centesimal

entry.def: Something that is infinitesimal is extremely small.

example.ex: ...mineral substances present in infinitesimal amounts in the soil...
example.tran: 土壤含有的极微量的矿物质
其中有一个极短暂的停顿。

auth_sentence.content: Infinitesimal amounts could send people into total mental disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content: Infinitesimal amounts could send people into total mental disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Infinitesimal amounts could send people into total mental disorder.

auth_sentence.content: Neither infinitesimal time nor infinitesimal space is possible.
auth_sentence.res_content: Neither infinitesimal time nor infinitesimal space is possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Neither infinitesimal time nor infinitesimal space is possible.

auth_sentence.content: The cells have each absorbed an almost infinitesimal amount of radiation energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The cells have each absorbed an almost infinitesimal amount of radiation energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cells have each absorbed an almost infinitesimal amount of radiation energy.
